import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet-async' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps'; import {Store} from '../Store'; import {useNavigate, Link} from 'react-router-dom' import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroup'; export default function PlaceOrderScreen() { const {state, dispatch: ctxDispatch} = useContext(Store); const {cart, userInfo} = state; return (
Preview Order

Preview Order

Shipping Name: {cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.zipCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country} Edit Payment Method: {cart.paymentMethod} Edit {cart.cartItems.map((item) => ( {' '} {item.name} {item.quantity} ${item.price} ))} Edit
) }
